metadata.title: CVE-2015-1192 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in kgb 1.0b4 allows remote attackersto write to arbitrary files via a full pathname in a crafted archive.

criterions.comment: kgb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
